attributes.action: BRING IN THE ARMY FOR RIOTS
attributes.additional_details: Total anarchy allowed to flourish on the streets of Britain for 4+ consecutive nights and the Police are left to deal with it on their own because the Government will NOT call in the Army to restore civil order and let the Police get on with their job.  There needs to be a time limit i.e.  1-2 nights of riots for the Army to be automatically deployed.
